features: Scroll smarter: With Logitech Signature M550 Wireless Mouse you get line-by-line precision for documents and super-fast scrolling for long web pages; simply switch modes with a flick of the SmartWheel
The optimal fit for your hand: This comfortable full size mouse is designed for larger hands, for the optimal fit
Upgrade your comfort: This work mouse provides long hours of comfort thanks to a contoured shape, soft thumb area, and rubber side grips that keep your hand snug and in place
Connect the way you like: Connect this cordless computer mouse in an instant via Bluetooth Low Energy or Logi Bolt USB receiver
Less noise, more focus: Whether working at the office or at home, Logitech Signature M550 is a quiet mouse, allowing you to enjoy 90 percent less click noise with SilentTouch technology*
24 month battery life: Work for up to 2 years on the single AA battery that comes with your multi-device mouse**
Works on multiple platforms: Experience seamless compatibility with Windows, macOS, Linux, ChromeOS, ipadOS, and Android operating systems with Logitech Signature M550 wireless Bluetooth mouse
Plastic parts in Signature M550 L include certified post-consumer recycled plastic (Black: 66%****)
body.description: Upgrade to smarter scrolling, better comfort, and more productivity with the Signature M550. The versatile mouse features an adaptive scroll SmartWheel that delivers line-by-line precision, and auto-switches to super fast free spin mode with the flick of a finger. A choice of sizes for smaller and larger hands means there's a perfect fit for anyone. Seamless wireless connectivity and a comfort shape keep you comfortable and productive hour after hour. Logitech’s SilentTouch technology delivers silent clicks to keep you focused – while 24-month battery life** and universal operating system compatibility ensure hassle-free performance. **Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditions

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 59 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LOGITECH SMARTWHEEL Get line-by-line precision for documents – and super fast scrolling for long web pages. Automatically switch modes with the flick of your finger.
COMFORT, UPGRADED Choose between two sizes for a perfect fit, and work long hours in comfort with a contoured shape and soft-to-the-touch thumb area.

CHOOSE YOUR SIZE Choose the right design for you – whether you have smaller or larger hands – for a perfect fit. Check out our sizing guide. SIZING GUIDE We recommend the Signature M550 for small-to-medium sized hands, and the Signature M550 L for large-sized hands. SILENT CLICKS Enjoy 90% less click noise thanks to Logitech’s SilentTouch technology. Less noise means more focus on the task at hand. CONNECT THE WAY YOU LIKE Connect via Bluetooth Low Energy or Logi Bolt USB receiver. Enjoy super easy, no-hassle connectivity every time. *USB-C adaptor sold separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new mouse and had a lot of trouble deciding because there are so many! This one has a great feel; love the matte finish and the silent clicking! It works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quiet click
reviews.reviewText: Great product. I got this to work with my MacBook Air and it does through Bluetooth. The clicking noises are almost non-existent (which I love) and it’s very seamless in scrolling. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a good mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Mouse!
reviews.reviewText: (09.30.23) i got this new mouse a week or so ago and decided to use it for a minute before jumping on here, so that i could give a meaningful report. it was advertised as being sized for small/medium hands, and it is in fact a very good fit. i have very long fingers, so i appreciate the more substantial support. this isn't the fanciest or most hi-tech mouse to be found, but it's all i needed and wanted - perfect for my limited laptop use. some of logitech's other mice have button controls on the left side of the unit for page up/down. some of the reviews commented on this being problematic for left-handed users, which i am. fortunately, i was able to find this one without the left side buttons. never had them before, so don't miss them now. this mouse operates very quietly, no clicking. the movement is very sensitive - much less drag than my previous generic mouse. the only concern i will watch for is the life span - hopefully it lasts a respectably good while. overall a great little purchase so far. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very smooth movement for large hands
reviews.reviewText: I like this mouse for its "large" hand capacity. Also, the mouse moves quite smoothly and clicker is sensitive. Since I just purchased this mouse, I did not comment on the battery life. The description states the battery should last about 2 yrs. Pending evaluation...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and small
reviews.reviewText: My wife loves this mouse. It’s very well build and light weight. She has small hands and these fits well. Recommend to anyone who needs a smaller mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Full Sized Mouse
reviews.reviewText: With large man hands, I wanted a full-sized mouse and this one fills the bill. It has a plug-in dongle or you can connect via Bluetooth. I chose Bluetooth and it has worked smoothly. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse but think carefully before purchasing this model (M550)
reviews.reviewText: Mouse arrived, connected to my Windows PC in a few seconds, and as I started to use it I realize I made a mistake when ordering and didn't notice that the M550 model does not have side buttons, which my previous mouse had. I thought to myself "I can live without those" but within a couple of hours realized this was a show-stopper. So I returned the M550 and have ordered the M650.In the time I did have it I really liked it (apart from the missing side buttons). Smooth, responsive. I ordered the large size and I have average male sized hands and it was the right size for me.So great mouse, but think carefully whether you need those side buttons before ordering this specific model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Smooth, Comfortable, Easy To Use Mouse
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Logi M550 for our iMac desktop. Apple's mouse was too difficult to use for my wife as she kept inadvertently pressing the right side, not left thus messing up everything she was trying to do. Now with the individual left and right silent buttons as well as the scroll wheel in the center, no more problems. This M550 connected instantly via Bluetooth to the Mac. I didn't need the dongle. We wanted something simple, easy to use, ergonomic for our hands and Logi delivered. Not too big and not too small. It does come with one Duracell AA battery.
